ygData.subject: Re: Special Bard Instruments
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Mistmoore Battle Drums... I was lucky enough to obtain a set of these from a good friend of mine when I was just a pup.  What I m ready to go after is
ygData.messageBody:
>Harmonic..I know what your thinking..NO I won't help you get them :)
>The offer for sol A still stands though :)

Mistmoore Battle Drums...
I was lucky enough to obtain a set of these from a good friend
of mine when I was just a pup. What I'm ready to go after is
Brahm's Horn, from the named mino 40ish or so, I'm told. I
would imagine a good party of 30-35s could take him out very
easily. Lord Grimrot is 37th, and was beaten by a 30,34,35.
And Grimrot hits _hard_.

As for SolA, since the weekend is here (meaning the jerks sign
on in numbers) I will be leaving CT tonight and heading out
to somewhere else. So SolA would be a good idea. I cannot
stand rubi-itis when it rears its ugly face.

I think my first stop is Permafrost for a white wolf cloak and
a 1h silvery war axe. I know exactly who to kill for what, I
just never had the group to clear and hold the throne room.
Maybe pick up a mammoth cloak, CIMS, or runed circlet for trade.
I could have gotten rubi legs last night had I camped the alchemist
a few more days for another cloak. <sigh>

I am definitely up for SolA this weekend, if it's convenient.
The charred BP would be nice, I just get lost in the gnome
castle too often. As for the gloves...

charred gloves: ac7, +3dex, +5int
elfhide gloves: ac4, +5dex, +5agi

I can justify the loss of 3ac (and the useless int) for +2 more dex
and +5 more agi. Elfhide gloves are the deal. Wish they were black.

I have already obtained a pair of charred boots. But the BP would
be nice.

Harmonic Distortion, 30th drummer.
League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
